original_title: Captured - Meet Robert A. Robinson Photographer
overview: Bob Robinson (1927-1996) and American photographer living and working in many parts of the world. Norway was one place. His book "Captured by the Norwegians" was published in 1958. Founding member of Manit√© - a photographic collective. Made the film about Sylvie Becker from East Berlin.
title: Captured - Meet Robert A. Robinson Photographer
